channel.title: attack.collection on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in attack.collection on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Esentutl Steals Browser Information
item.description: One way Qbot steals sensitive information is by extracting browser data from Internet Explorer and Microsoft Edge by using the built-in utility esentutl.exe

item.title: Windows Screen Capture with CopyFromScreen
item.description: Adversaries may attempt to take screen captures of the desktop to gather information over the course of an operation. Screen capturing functionality may be included as a feature of a remote access tool used in post-compromise operations

item.title: VeeamBackup Database Credentials Dump
item.description: Detects dump of credentials in VeeamBackup dbo

item.title: Linux Capabilities Discovery
item.description: Detects attempts to discover the files with setuid/setgid capabilitiy on them. That would allow adversary to escalate their privileges.

item.title: Clipboard Collection with Xclip Tool
item.description: Detects attempts to collect data stored in the clipboard from users with the usage of xclip tool. Xclip has to be installed. Highly recommended using rule on servers, due to high usage of clipboard utilities on user workstations.

item.title: Screen Capture with Import Tool
item.description: Detects adversary creating screen capture of a desktop with Import Tool. Highly recommended using rule on servers, due to high usage of screenshot utilities on user workstations. ImageMagick must be installed.

item.title: Screen Capture with Xwd
item.description: Detects adversary creating screen capture of a full with xwd. Highly recommended using rule on servers, due high usage of screenshot utilities on user workstations

item.title: Conti Backup Database
item.description: Detects a command used by conti to dump database

item.title: Conti Volume Shadow Listing
item.description: Detects a command used by conti to exfiltrate NTDS

item.title: Google Full Network Traffic Packet Capture
item.description: Identifies potential full network packet capture in gcp. This feature can potentially be abused to read sensitive data from unencrypted internal traffic.

item.title: WinDivert Driver Load
item.description: Detects the load of the Windiver driver, a powerful user-mode capture/sniffing/modification/blocking/re-injection package for Windows

item.title: Powershell Keylogging
item.description: Adversaries may log user keystrokes to intercept credentials as the user types them.

item.title: Recon Information for Export with Command Prompt
item.description: Once established within a system or network, an adversary may use automated techniques for collecting internal data.

item.title: Automated Collection Command PowerShell
item.description: Once established within a system or network, an adversary may use automated techniques for collecting internal data.

item.title: Automated Collection Command Prompt
item.description: Once established within a system or network, an adversary may use automated techniques for collecting internal data.

item.title: Recon Information for Export with PowerShell
item.description: Once established within a system or network, an adversary may use automated techniques for collecting internal data

item.title: Compress Data and Lock With Password for Exfiltration With 7-ZIP
item.description: An adversary may compress or encrypt data that is collected prior to exfiltration using 3rd party utilities

item.title: Compress Data and Lock With Password for Exfiltration With WINZIP
item.description: An adversary may compress or encrypt data that is collected prior to exfiltration using 3rd party utilities

item.title: Use of CLIP
item.description: Adversaries may collect data stored in the clipboard from users copying information within or between applications.

item.title: Powershell Local Email Collection
item.description: Adversaries may target user email on local systems to collect sensitive information. Files containing email data can be acquired from a user’s local system, such as Outlook storage or cache files.

item.title: Zip A Folder With PowerShell For Staging In Temp
item.description: Use living off the land tools to zip a file and stage it in the Windows temporary folder for later exfiltration

item.title: Mavinject Inject DLL Into Running Process
item.description: Injects arbitrary DLL into running process specified by process ID. Requires Windows 10.

item.title: Copy from Admin Share
item.description: Detects a suspicious copy command to or from an Admin share

item.title: Cisco Collect Data
item.description: Collect pertinent data from the configuration files

item.title: Cisco Stage Data
item.description: Various protocols maybe used to put data on the device for exfil or infil

item.title: Audio Capture via PowerShell
item.description: Detects audio capture via PowerShell Cmdlet.

item.title: Audio Capture via SoundRecorder
item.description: Detect attacker collecting audio via SoundRecorder application.

item.title: Data Compressed - rar.exe
item.description: An adversary may compress data (e.g., sensitive documents) that is collected prior to exfiltration in order to make it portable and minimize the amount of data sent over the network.

item.title: Psr.exe Capture Screenshots
item.description: The psr.exe captures desktop screenshots and saves them on the local machine

item.title: Suspicious Compression Tool Parameters
item.description: Detects suspicious command line arguments of common data compression tools

item.title: iOS Implant URL Pattern
item.description: Detects URL pattern used by iOS Implant

item.title: ADFS Database Named Pipe Connection
item.description: Detects suspicious local connections via a named pipe to the AD FS configuration database (Windows Internal Database). Used to access information such as the AD FS configuration settings which contains sensitive information used to sign SAML tokens.

item.title: Audio Capture
item.description: Detects attempts to record audio with arecord utility

item.title: AWS EC2 VM Export Failure
item.description: An attempt to export an AWS EC2 instance has been detected. A VM Export might indicate an attempt to extract information from an instance.

item.title: Clipboard Collection of Image Data with Xclip Tool
item.description: Detects attempts to collect image data stored in the clipboard from users with the usage of xclip tool. Xclip has to be installed. Highly recommended using rule on servers, due to high usage of clipboard utilities on user workstations.

item.title: Exchange PowerShell Snap-Ins Used by HAFNIUM
item.description: Detects adding and using Exchange PowerShell snap-ins to export mailbox data by HAFNIUM

item.title: Processes Accessing the Microphone and Webcam
item.description: Potential adversaries accessing the microphone and webcam in an endpoint.

item.title: Rar with Password or Compression Level
item.description: Detects the use of rar.exe, on the command line, to create an archive with password protection or with a specific compression level. This is pretty indicative of malicious actions.

item.title: Screen Capture - macOS
item.description: Detects attempts to use screencapture to collect macOS screenshots

item.title: Suspicious Access to Sensitive File Extensions
item.description: Detects known sensitive file extensions accessed on a network share

item.title: Suspicious Access to Sensitive File Extensions - Zeek
item.description: Detects known sensitive file extensions via Zeek

item.title: Suspicious Camera and Microphone Access
item.description: Detects Processes accessing the camera and microphone from suspicious folder

item.title: Suspicious System.Drawing Load
item.description: A General detection for processes loading System.Drawing.ni.dll. This could be an indicator of potential Screen Capture.
